mapper.sql: id, name, type, url, app_name, auth_code, parent_id, parent_ids, available
mapper.select:
select
from tab_permission where 1=1
AND available = #{available,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY id ASC

select
from tab_permission where type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY id ASC
